content.prompt: Jeremy is a doctoral student who wants to investigate the effectiveness of a new mnemonic device with third graders. His plan includes asking the children to complete an informed consent form. Which of the following reasons would cause his research project to be denied by an Institutional Review Board?

choices.label: New teaching techniques are not researched.
Jeremy is not considered a legitimate researcher.
Children can express approval but only parents or legal guardians can provide consent.
Confidentiality cannot be assured in this scenario.

skill.text: 2.D: Evaluate whether a psychological research scenario followed appropriate ethical procedures.
